abstract: DealBook Online; Goldman Sachs will pay $7 million fine to Securities and Exchange Commission to settle civil charges it did not maintain safeguards to stop thousands of erroneous options trades from going through in 2013.
lead_paragraph: The S.E.C. says the 2013 erroneous trading highlights the need for Wall Street firms to maintain better systems to prevent technological glitches that can roil markets.

headline.main: Goldman Sachs to Pay $7 Million Penalty Over Options Glitch

snippet: The S.E.C. says the 2013 erroneous trading highlights the need for Wall Street firms to maintain better systems to prevent technological glitches that can roil markets.
